details.name: Apply for a Citi Rewards Visa Card today and get S$10 shopping voucher
(10 points or 4 miles)for every S$1 spent on clothes,bags and shoes
for every S$1 spent on Amazon
for holidays, gifts cards, merchandise and more
Main card applicants must be 21 years old and above
For Singaporeans and PRs, minimum annual income of S$30,000
For foreigners, minimum annual income to qualify is S$42,000
Annual fee for Main Card is S$192.60(inclusive of GST) and first year fee is waived for Main Card
to view interest, other fee and charges

We are delighted with your interest in Citi Card, You may continue your application via email sent to you. alternatively our friendly Citi Staff will contact you in 1-3 business days about your application
